article_title: The Other Big Supreme Court Case To Watch This Week

article_metadata.author: Capital Flows

og.description: BY JAMES R. COPLAND - This Wednesday, many legal observers will be analyzing the Supreme Court’s oral arguments in King v. Burwell. I’ll be following those arguments, of course, but I’ll also be closely scrutinizing the Court’s oral arguments in another case, City of Los Angeles v. Patel. The Court’s ruling in Patel could impact how police officers track down criminals in cities across the nation.
